interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2020/09/16
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nick Nanton'], 'Producers': ['Russell Brunson', 'Nick Nanton', 'JW Dicks', 'Todd Dickerson'], 'Starring': ['Tim Ballard', 'Tony Robbins', 'Glenn Beck'], 'Studio': ['DNA Films']}
Review Text: While the information is disturbing, it's imperative that we all become aware of what's going on in our world.  The best way to help is to be aware!  This is a global issue and together we can all change the outcome.  Take the time to watch this and please go volunteer with O.U.R.  I did after watching!
Review Title: Awareness is Key
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.title: Awareness is Key
actual_interaction.text: While the information is disturbing, it's imperative that we all become aware of what's going on in our world.  The best way to help is to be aware!  This is a global issue and together we can all change the outcome.  Take the time to watch this and please go volunteer with O.U.R.  I did after watching!
